recipe.title: Healthy Oat and Honey Bread
recipe.comment: c/o skinnyfitalicious. You can make this gluten free if you use gluten free oats
recipe.ingredient: 1/4 cup olive oil or melted coconut oil
Extra oats or seeds (for the top)
recipe.step: Preheat oven to 160C and prepare a loaf tin with baking paper. Mix dry ingredients and in a separate bowl mix wet ingredients. Fold the wet ingredients through the dry ingredients and pour into pan. Top with extra oats or other seeds you have on hand. Cook in oven for 45-60 minutes or until toothpick comes out clean. Remove from tin and cool on wire wrack until cool enough to cut. I have mine with peanut butter - yum! Will keep in airtight container for 10 days.
